Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_FoodsDropCoin
Text.Desc: All food has a very low chance of yielding coins.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_FoodsDropCoin2
Text.Desc: All food has a small chance to produce coins when eaten

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_FoodsDropCoin3
Text.Desc: All food has a high chance of yielding coins.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_FaBaoSpecialAbility
Text.Desc: Gain a random rare artifact effect when an artifact is completed.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.0.Desc: Increases damage to targets of Earth element by 80%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.1.Desc: For every 15th strike, it will attack the cultivator's body itself, penetrating shield and deal additional damage.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.2.Desc: For every 3 attacks, generates 9 spike apparitions that last 3 seconds.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.3.Desc: The base power of artifact is increased by 1% for every 1 second the sword maintained flying. The effect is cleared when it returns.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.4.Desc: For every 12 attacks on a same artifact, it can disable the target for a certain length of time corresponding to its tier.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.5.Desc: For every 1% Health lower, Artifact Power is increased by 5%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.6.Desc: Each living being killed will increase its power by 10%, up to a maximum stacks of 36. The effect is cleared if it doesn't drink blood for 1 day.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.7.Desc: Every 9th attack will cast a spell on the target enemy.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.9.Desc: At the cost of being shattered, defy death once and restore all damage dealt to you.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.10.Desc: The closer the user to maximum lifespan, the more powerful the artifact will be.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.11.Desc: 10% of damage dealt will be replenished to the artifact's Qi.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.12.Desc: For every 7 attacks, generate a swordsprite that lasts 7 seconds.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.14.Desc: Increases damage to targets of Wood element by 100%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.15.Desc: Increases damage to targets of Earth element by 100%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.16.Desc: Increases damage to targets of Fire element by 100%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.17.Desc: Increases damage to targets of Metal element by 100%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.18.Desc: Increases damage to targets of Water element by 100%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.19.Desc: Surrounding the whole body, it focuses on defense and will not attack.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.20.Desc: For every 10,000 Qi consumed, damage is increased by 10%, up to a maximum of 1000%. The effect is reset when replenishing Qi to the artifact.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.21.Desc: For each kind of Elixir consumed, its power is increased by 5%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.22.Desc: Every 2 attacks reduce skill cooldown by 1 second.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.23.Desc: Sword Mastery skill level increased by 10.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.24.Desc: Deals 1.5x damage when fighting against other artifacts.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.25.Desc: When dealing damage, there is a 10% chance of dealing 5x damage.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.26.Desc: Deals 1.5x damage when attacking the enemy's body itself.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.27.Desc: When attacking the enemy's body itself, there is a 1% chance of dealing an additional damage that is equal to 30% of the current target's Qi.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.28.Desc: Fundamentally increases your Artifact Power Bonus by 30%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.29.Desc: Fundamentally increases your Artifact Qi Bonus by 30%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.30.Desc: Fundamentally increases your Artifact's Knockback Resistance by 30%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.31.Desc: Fundamentally increases your Artifact Turn Speed by 30%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.32.Desc: Fundamentally increases your Artifact Qi Recovery Rate by 30%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.33.Desc: Fundamentally increases your Artifact Knockback by 30%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.34.Desc: Fundamentally increases your Artifact Fly Speed by 30%.
Text.Effects.0.SpecialAbilities.35.Desc: Power of first sword strike increased by 500%. The effect is reset when replenishing Qi to the artifact.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_PlantIgnoreTemp
Text.Desc: Sect plants ignore temperature conditions for growth.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Persuasion
Text.Desc: Slightly increases the persuasion success rate of sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Persuasion2
Text.Desc: Increase the persuasion success rate of sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Persuasion3
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the persuasion success rate of sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_PuppetDropHPStop
Text.Desc: Puppet ceases to degrade.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_1
Text.Desc: Slightly increase the Qi recovery speed of sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_2
Text.Desc: Increase sect disciples' Qi recovery speed.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_3
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the Qi recovery speed of sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_4
Text.Desc: Enhance sect disciples' cultivation speed.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_5
Text.Desc: Significantly increase the cultivation speed of sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_6
Text.Desc: Sect disciples become less prone to hunger.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_7
Text.Desc: Sect disciples become less prone to fatigue.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_8
Text.Desc: Sect disciples become less prone to Thirst.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_9
Text.Desc: Slightly increases the strength of sect disciples' Qi barrier.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_10
Text.Desc: Increase the strength of Qi barrier for sect disciples

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_11
Text.Desc: Slightly increases the probability of sect disciples breaking through bottlenecks.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_12
Text.Desc: Increase the probability of sect disciples breaking through bottlenecks.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_13
Text.Desc: Significantly increases the probability of sect disciples breaking through bottlenecks.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_14
Text.Desc: Slightly increases the ability of sect disciples to practice inedia.

Text.Desc: Improve the ability of sect disciples to abstain from food and drink

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_16
Text.Desc: Greatly enhances the ability of sect disciples to abstain from food and drink.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_17
Text.Desc: Slightly reduces the attainment bonus of Sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_18

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_19
Text.Desc: Significantly lowers Sect disciples' Dao merit bonus.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_20
Text.Desc: Slightly increases sect disciples' lifespan cap.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_21
Text.Desc: Increase sect disciples' lifespan limit.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_22
Text.Desc: Greatly enhances sect disciples' lifespan cap.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_23
Text.Desc: Slightly increase the movement speed of sect disciples

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_24

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_25
Text.Desc: Greatly increase sect disciples' movement speed

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_26

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_27

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_28
Text.Desc: Enhance sect disciples' learning speed.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_29

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_32

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_35

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yang_Modifier_36
Text.Desc: The formation load capacity of sect disciples has been significantly increased.

Text.Desc: The formation load capacity of sect disciples has been significantly increased.
